name: Masha Dress Up
description:
** WIP **

Item moving is a bit jank, hopefully an update will be coming that'll make only one item movable at a time.

Controls:

click to move around clothing

double click to flip clothing

f1/f2 to go through background images

spacebar to take a screenshot
